head: BharatGen 2025 Hackathon
description: Secured 2nd runner-up (₹30,000) for CureCue, an offline-first AI adherence assistant that blends computer vision, voice inputs, and clinician analytics.

head: CureCue Research Publication
description: Published CureCue’s multi-model pipeline on ResearchGate, detailing YOLOv8 (92.3% mAP) + Gemini 2.0 Flash workflows for patient self-care.

head: Educational Youtube Channel
description: Creator of 'Data Ki Science' on YouTube, teaching Python, SQL, and machine learning concepts through hands-on walkthroughs.
